offers.title: Fresh Start
offers.p1: Start your day off right with a daily $20 credit at The Flyby café. Serving delicious and healthy breakfasts featuring made-to-order meals, grab and go options and artisan coffee.

artDirection.alt: The lobby interior of the Ameswell Hotel

offers.title: Puppy Love
offers.p1: Treat your four-legged friend to an unforgettable stay at our pet-friendly property!  With a discounted pet fee of $50 (reg. $75), collapsible dog bowl, pet toy, and organic dog treat.

artDirection.alt: The outdoor pool in the evening at the Ameswell Hotel

offers.title: Work from Ameswell
offers.p1: Work from one of our spacious, light-filled guest rooms or many public spaces. Get inspired in the Ames Library or lounging by the pool. This package includes: day use of a King Room, access to the pool, fitness center, library, and art gallery, two bottled waters, one coffee, tea, or G.0.A.T. Fuel Energy Drink.

artDirection.alt: The outdoor pool in the evening at the Ameswell Hotel

offers.title: Wellness King
offers.p1: Make the most of our wellness offerings when you book a room in our Wellness Wing. Each room offers over 4,000 classes on the Mirror – from yoga, meditation, ballet and boxing. This offer includes the Mirror Fitness app, adjustable weights, resistance bands and yoga mat by Team Fitnesse, choice of G.O.A.T. Fuel All Natural Energy Drink by Jerry Rice, and easy access to fitness center, outdoor pool and spa treatment rooms.

artDirection.alt: The outdoor pool in the evening at the Ameswell Hotel

offers.title: Date Night
offers.p1: Enjoy a romantic getaway with a late check-out and daily $75 food and beverage credit to enjoy at Roger bar and Restaurant. Or make it a picnic on our expansive lawn with items from The Flyby.
